meanings.definition: To attempt to do something again.
meanings.sent1: I will retry the puzzle to solve it this time.
meanings.sent2: She decided to retry the recipe after it didn't turn out well the first time.
meanings.sent3: After failing to catch the ball, he decided to retry with more focus.
meanings.sent4: She retried the dance routine until she got all the steps right.
meanings.sent5: He retried the level in the game until he finally beat it.

meanings.definition: An act of trying to do something again.
meanings.sent1: The retry of the experiment showed different results.
meanings.sent2: She clicked on the retry button to start the level over.
meanings.sent3: The retry of the song made everyone laugh as she forgot the lyrics again.
meanings.sent4: The retry of the race was more intense as the competitors pushed harder.
meanings.sent5: He pressed the retry option to give the quiz another go.
